title: Hextech?
body: Why do they get to disable my zephr and im not able to use it, while they can use it. Hextech is ridiculious.

replies.body:
Hmm, I have seen zekes and pretty sure locket proc AFTER the 8 seconds. Thing that sucks is few if any allies will be in adjacent hex when the item becomes active.. Could just be buggy though, as to why I have seen it appear to work. 
Sort of how GA and Redemption don't work all the time.
Zephyr should activate once the 8 seconds wears off right?

> [{quoted}](name=Ztoka,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=UtvY72lL,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-08-19T17:59:31.842+0000)
>
> Zephyr should activate once the 8 seconds wears off right?

It doesn't.  Neither do Locket or Zeke's.
Welcome to TFT Patch 9.16. Join us as we wait for next patch in hopes that Riot listens for once.
